item.title: 061-20250326-HiddenSanctuary
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Sashenstar and Arey start approaching the creature even though it appears to be asleep

item.title: 060-20250306-ThroughTheWaterfall
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log We are behind th waterfall. There is a passage that we are now in that is dark but weirdly quiet almost like a muffled bubble around us.

item.title: 059-20250226-AfterWoodsFight
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Puss decides to use “talk to the dead” spell and asks the following questions - who is chald - our master - Why are you on this island - looking for you - why were you looking for us?

item.title: 058-20250215-LostInTheWoodsOnAnIsland
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log I am following sneakily along but not with the group… pretty much doing parrallel play I hear some twigs snapping coming from the direction we came from I slow down and start paying attention to what might be coming up behind us I start to see four of the crew searching the beach following the groups path.
Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Ther are 8 huminoud pirates and 4 drow that are systematically searching the shore on the oposite side of the bay from us.
